duration_raw: until the Arcane Cascade stance ends
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">[Cascade Countermeasure](/Spells.aspx?ID=1036)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 143 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

**Requirements** You're benefiting from Arcane Cascade.
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the Arcane Cascade stance ends
</row>

</column>

---

You quickly adjust your Arcane Cascade to offer magical protection. You gain resistance 5 against damage from spells. As normal, using Arcane Cascade again means you've ended the stance, and the spell ends.

---
**Heightened (+3)** The resistance increases by 5.
name: Cascade Countermeasure

text: Cascade Countermeasure Source Secrets of Magic pg. 143 1.1 Cast Single Action somatic Requirements You're benefiting from Arcane Cascade. Duration until the Arcane Cascade stance ends --- You quickly adjust your Arcane Cascade to offer magical protection. You gain resistance 5 against damage from spells. As normal, using Arcane Cascade again means you've ended the stance, and the spell ends. --- Heightened (+3) The resistance increases by 5.
